thread.title: 10 museums to get in touch with your inner aviation geek
thread.title_full: 10 museums to get in touch with your inner aviation geek

author: Editor
title: 10 museums to get in touch with your inner aviation geek
text:
Posted on September 24, 2015 by Editor 
Ever wonder what happens to a retired airplane? Well, some of them continue their service in aviation museums around the globe. A surprising array of museums offer aviation enthusiasts up-close and person looks at the history of flight, and often at or near major airports. Ever dreamed of stepping foot inside of a concorde? Going to a cinema inside of a Boeing 737? Having cocktails in an airplane hangar? Check out some of our favorite aviation museums: Want more stories like this?
